name: Finger Maze
description:
Play Finger Maze, the most amazing game in the App Store! Trace through randomly generated mazes using your finger within the given time limit.

_________________________________


- Randomly generated mazes. Unlimited number of mazes.
- Compete against friends in an online match .
- Offline hotseat multiplayer.
- Multiple game modes, each with their own leaderboard.

_________________________________

◆◆◆◆◆ "Great music. Keeps me coming back for more."
◆◆◆◆◆ "Fast gameplay. I keep telling myself just one more maze..."
◆◆◆◆◆ "Best puzzle game"
◆◆◆◆◆ "So much gameplay for only $0.99. What a deal."

_________________________________

UNLIMITED GAMEPLAY
Mazes are generated randomly which means that no two games will ever be the same.

ONLINE MATCHMAKING
Challenge your friends online or use matchmaking to find an opponent.

LOCAL HOTSEAT MULTIPLAYER
Play against your friends with just one device. Take turns completing mazes to see who can get the best score.

DAILY CHALLENGE
Everyday there is a new challenge to complete. Compete in the leaderboards for the best daily score.

GAME CENTER
Compete for the best score in the online leaderboards. 7 different leaderboards keeps you coming back to make sure you have the best score. Earn Game Center points by completing all of the achievements.
